title: The Torment, The Shadow, The Heart
description: As the King of Talbadas nears his end, and treasonous parties seek to usurp the throne, young farmer Halm Dresden soon finds that his father's dying advice, the actions of two elves, and a nightmare vision have put him on a destined path.As impressionable youth and some of his friends join this treacherous league, he has a sword made and prepares for looming conflict.
author: T.M. Shannon
